"A.P.241/4/7/18:30": "We have recently confirmed that Ether has caused all of the mysterious explosions occurring on Earth."
"On Earth, they're either being covered up or being viewed as accidental explosions."
"Most likely, this is Bethor's doing."
"Yes, based on data from our previous conflict with him, the enemy's embodiment ability is assumed to be the creation of explosives."
"Also, the range of activities has been narrowed into a circular area. The next target is probably within the city's capital..."
"Wait, Hitsugi, where are you going?"
"The reason he's rampaging on Earth is to lure us out of hiding."

"It's also my fault that things turned out like this...
I don't want to involve anyone else anymore...
I'm going to settle this once and for all."
"1. Don't go dashing in by yourself."
"2. Calm down, it's too early."
"Don't stop me, <%me>. I can't afford to cause any more casualties because of my mistakes."
"No, you can't. Just wait a bit longer."
"That's right, it's too early for that. Please give me more time. As far as I know, it's under preparation."
"Under preparation?"
"We're nearly done with ensuring safety within areas where casualties may occur, along with concealing information."
"I already knew how you would act if I told you about this information, Hitsugi."
"You're like an open book. I also predicted that <%me> would go along as well."
"1. I can't leave you alone like that, Hitsugi."
"2. I'm not letting you go alone."
"<%me>... Now I feel like an idiot getting myself all worked up."
"Yup, you really are an idiot. You were about to walk straight into the enemy's trap."
"You're right..."
"Big sis..."
"Don't give me that uneasy look, Aru. It's going to be okay, I've calmed down."
"<%me>. Please take care of big sis."
"You've got quite a personality there."
"Okay, concealment and isolation of surrounding area complete! <%me>, Hitsugi! Feel free to sortie whenever you're ready!"
